body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, farmer. Shelby County native. Married to Julia Ann Booker Hornsby. Father of William Hornsby, Joseph W. Hornsby, Frances Cordelia Hornsby, Thomas Lewis Hornsby, Mattie Julia Hornsby, and Cynthia Hornsby. Farmer in Shelby County in 1860.
